title: Your Privacy is
description: Built from the ground up with privacy-first architecture. We don't just promise securityâ€”we guarantee it.

features.title: Zero-Knowledge Encryption
features.description: Military-grade encryption happens on your device. We can't see your content even if we wanted to.

features.title: No Tracking
features.description: We don't track, store, or analyze your activity. What you share stays between you and your recipient.

features.title: No Data Retention
features.description: Content is automatically deleted after access or expiration. Nothing remains on our servers.

features.title: Time-Limited Access
features.description: Set your own expiration time. From minutes to days, you control how long content is available.
